text: Gotta love the buildup in this theme. A magical soundtrack for a magical game. I wonder what Hideaki Kobayashi is up to, I see that he hasn't worked on anything since 2014. You know what, listening to this theme, I could absolutely see him collaborate on a Xenoblade soundtrack.
author: SupraDarky

text: Well, Hideaki Kobayashi did work on the soundtrack for Phantasy Star Online 2, which sounds even more like it belongs in a Xenoblade game in my opinion. If you haven't heard that soundtrack, I'd say it's worth checking out.
author: Wonderiku

text: SupraDarky where in the game does this play? I've played this game for a decade and I don't remember this theme...
author: JessePrower

text: Yesss I love PSO music.  Have you had a chance to listen to the PSO2 soundtrack?  It has some really good music too.  Shame it's not ported for non-asian servers.
